column4: Hello. I have installed (k)ubuntu Dapper and there's one problem that drives me mad: gam_server. There are running gam_server processes for each user and they consume about 20 % of cpu. How can I solve that?
hmmm, what was gam_server part of?
yeah, wait ahead :) I just didn't know what gamin was used for
gam_server isn't running on mine right now actually. I remember seeing it, it must have disappeared on me :)
I think it's the Gnome (wth gnome on Kubuntu?!?) file alteration monitor.
yeah, I'm running Gnome right now ;)
